thread.title: Reese Witherspoon shares photo posing with her daughter, breaks the Internet
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon shares photo posing with her daughter, breaks the Internet

author: Daniela Sternitzky-Di Napoli, Houston Chronicle
title: Reese Witherspoon shares photo posing with her daughter, breaks the Internet
text:
MICHELLE OBAMA AND MALIA AND SASHA OBAMA 
Michelle and Malia at 17 years old and Sasha at 14. 
MICHELLE OBAMA AND MALIA AND SASHA OBAMA 
Michelle and Malia at 17 years old and Sasha at 14. Photo: White House Website/Getty Reese Witherspoon shares photo posing with her daughter, breaks the Internet 1 / 20 Back to Gallery 
It's no secret that Reese Witherspoon's daughter, Ava Elizabeth Phillippe, is nearly an exact copy her mother, but after posting a photo of the two to Instagram , Witherspoon has seemingly thrown the Internet into a tailspin. 
The Oscar-winning actress shared an image of themselves at the premier for Witherspoon's upcoming HBO series, "Big Little Lies" and the similarities are undeniable. 
People on social media immediately started reacting to the image with comments like "Reese Witherspoon and her daughter literally look like twins it's scary!!" - @ClaireBrownleeX 
(Story continues below.) 
Leading Ladies Nicole Kidman and Reese Witherspoon, have come together on screen to champion female empowerment in HBO's "Big Little Lies." The Oscar-winning actresses both star in and executive-produce the seven-part limited TV series, based on the 2014 novel of the same name, after seeing the opportunity to put diverse women on the screen. Media: Brandpoint 
Another commentor said that "Reese Witherspoon's daughter looks more like Reese than Reese does." 
Someone even thought Witherspoon was posing with a statue and not her teenage daughter. 
Witherspoon is not the only mother with a mini-me for a daughter. 
Take a look through the gallery above to see other celebrity moms and their lookalike daughters. Latest from the SFGATE homepage: Click below for the top news from around the Bay Area and beyond.
